column2: Euro area 19 (fixed composition) as of 1 January 2015 - Closing balance sheet/Positions/Stocks - Maastricht debt - Liabilities (Net Incurrence of) - maturity: All original maturities - counterpart area: World (all entities, including reference area, including IO), counterpart sector: Total economy - Consolidated, Current prices, Face value - Domestic currency (incl. conversion to current currency made using a fixed parity); ratio to the annual moving sum of gross domestic product, Neither seasonally adjusted nor calendar adjusted - ESA 2010
